title: TVS BS-I201N (Barcode Scanner)
summary: This highly reliable scanner is ideal for the daily retail industry, office environment as well as industrial sectors - and is the ultimate companion for users requiring competence, durability and convenience.Capable of reading common 1D and 2D barcodesStable and durableComprehensive data captureCompact and ergonomic designSupports multiple data interfaces
specs: Product Description DetailsSpecification for BS1201N  DirectThermalAiming Element650 nm Visible Laser Diode (VLD)Illumination Element635 nm visible LEDOptical System640 x 480 pixels (VGA type CCD)Sensitivity360° (Omnidirectional Rotational Sensitivity)Resolution6.67 mil (PDF 417), 5 mil (Code 39)Print Contrast30% @ UPC/EAN 100%Indicators (LED)Two-colour LED (green & red)Programmable OperationPower mode, beeper tone, focImage FormatUS control, image control & trigger modeSystem InterfacesBMP(*.bmp), TIFF(*.tif), JPEG(*.jpg) RS-232C, USB 1.1Physical DimensionsSize (L x D x H) mm106.7 x 58.0 x 155.0Weight148 g (stand excluded)CableStandard 2.0 M straightPowerInput Voltage5V DC ±5%Power Consumption1.5 WOperating Current350 mARegulatoryEMCCE & FCC DOC compliance, BSMIEnvironmental-Operating ConditionsOperating Temperature-20°C - 40°C (-4°F - 104°F)Storage Temperature-40°C - 70°C (-40°F - 158°F)Humidity5% - 95% RH (non-condensing)Light LevelsMax. 100,000 Lux (fluorescence)Drop DurabilityDesigned to withstand 1.2 M dropsDecoding Capability1D BarcodesUPC / EAN / JAN, UPC / EAN withsupplementary, JAN 8 & JAN 13, ISBN /ISSN, Code 39, Code 39 with full ASCII,trioptic Code 39, Codabar (Nm7), Code128, Code 128 with full ASCII, Code 93,Interleaved 2 of 5 (ITF), Addendum 2 of 5,MSI / Plessy, China Postal Code, UPC / EANRSS, RSS ariants2D BarcodesPDF 417, MicroPDF 417, MaxiCode,DataMatrix (ECC 200), QR Code, AztecCode, Postal Code, Composite Codes, MicroQR CodeOptionsJapanese Bookland EAN, IATA Code, Code32, Industrial 2 of 5, Standard 2 of 5, Discrete2 of 5, Matrix 2 of 5, Code 11
